price: 61. Markay labadii ciidan isu muuqdeen, Waxay yidhaahdeen asxaabtii Muuse: “Waa nala haleelay”.
arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ قَالَ أَصۡحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدۡرَكُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falammā tarāā al-jamʿāni qāla aṣḥābu mūsā innā lamud'rakūna
